pages.text: Works very much like its [little brother](entry://equipment/lesser_potion_pendant).\However, this version has three chambers, each of which can be filled with a different potion - which also means it can only support effects of level I.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Use the [Potion Workshop](entry://brewing/potion_workshop) to infuse it, by placing it where the [#](bb00bb)Bottle[#]() would normally go.\\To clear its effect, put it in a crafting grid.
